mapper.select: SELECT count, to_char(cr_at, 'dd hh24:mi') AS created_at FROM (SELECT SUM(count) AS count, DATE_TRUNC('hour', created_at) AS cr_at FROM dns_stat_10sec_all where created_at >= now() - interval '1 day' GROUP BY cr_at ORDER BY cr_at ASC) AS dns;
